answers.answer: Hi there!Blood sugar levels in the range of 170-179 before food are not particularly good. I would suggest getting this evaluated by a primary care pediatrician initially and if required, an endocrinologist consultation may be sought.Hope this is helpful.Take care!
No, this is not OK.  She needs to see her pediatrician.  It does sound very much like early diabetes and needs to be agressively evaluated and managed.
Thank you all so much she is going to her pediatrican today

question: Hello my 2 1/2 year old girl has peeing out of her dipper she drinks so much will not eat says her belly hurts all the time i have been testing her blood suger for a few days when she got up it was 114 fasting then befor lunch it was 170 i am going to check it agin in two hours yesterday it was 179 is this ok or bad...
title: Diabetes in 2 year old
